content.question: The confederacy formed to “exasperate the Indians against the English” was motivated primarily by which of the following?

choices.label: Fraudulent trade deals between the leaders of Plymouth Colony and the Wampanoags
Dispossession of Wampanoag land and threats to their sovereignty
Forced religious conversion of Wampanoags by Puritan missionaries
Intermarriage with the English, which threatened Wampanoag cultural independence

content.answer: Dispossession of Wampanoag land and threats to their sovereignty

topic.text: 2.5: Interactions Between American Indians and Europeans
